submission.title: Vicariance as a Desirable Meta-Layer Property
submission.overview: Vicariance, drawn from biological systems, describes how temporary divisions in ecosystems allow novel or fragile designs to incubate before facing widespread exposure or competition. This submission proposes Vicariance as a desirable meta-layer property — one that would enable safe experimentation and staged integration of innovations, ideas, and social formations within decentralized digital networks. It suggests resisting immediate global unification to maintain diverse paths of emergence. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3.

I am suggesting that it would be desirable for the Internet to maintain this property, rather than unify the human population as fast as AI can reach-out to all of us simultaneously.

directly_addressed_dps.dp: DP3 – Adaptive Governance Supporting an Exponentially Growing Community
directly_addressed_dps.summary: Supports community divergence and parallel experimentation through semi-isolated governance domains.
Enables diverse sub-communities to emerge and evolve organically without premature centralization.
Provides protective fragmentation to avoid AI domination and preserve local autonomy in oversight structures.

clarifications_and_extensions.dp: DP3 – Adaptive Governance Supporting an Exponentially Growing Community
clarifications_and_extensions.title: Incubation Through Vicariance
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Recommends preserving semi-isolated network zones to allow gradual, protected development of social, technical, and cultural innovations.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Without vicariant conditions, emergent systems face immediate exposure to dominant actors and dynamics, which can prematurely suppress diversity and resilience.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Containment via Structural Vicariance
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Suggests vicariance as a structural containment mechanism — not by suppression, but by designing segments of the network where AI influence can be regulated and scaled carefully.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: This enables human communities to evolve practices without undue pressure from uniform, unbounded AI systems — preserving choice, context, and co-development.
